name: Super Amazing Blood Cell Adventures (DEMO)
description:
Your body fights bacteria, viruses, and funguses every day. Now it's time to take your part!

Whitey is a white blood cell, who is in love with Reddo, a red blood cell. They are a happy couple, but then the disaster happens. ViRuss, the evil virus attacks them, takes Reddo with him, and sets up unusual traps for Whitey  in his escape. You take control of the boy lovebird and chase the virus through the Veins, the Lungs, the Hearth, the Kidneys and for a finale , back to the Veins. 

This adventure will not be easy, you will find yourself against deadly traps, bosses and secrets. Come and play, you have nothing to lose, but your sanity!

-Complete controller support

-Skill and timing based levels

-Custom made, annoying music (currently 8 "masterpieces")

-Simplistic art style

-This demo contains the first chapter (10+1 levels, ~6-10 mins of playtime)

In the future of the demo:

-Bug fixes

-GradeA time adjustments

In the future of the full game:

-More music and sound effects

-A shadow dimension for all chapters (this means the full game will contain 50 base levels, 50 shadow levels and 5 secret levels)

-Input system rework

Disclaimer: this section will be refreshed after every development cycle, it serves as a devlog until the release of the game.

The second chapter is nearly done, just finishing touches are needed.

Short answer: not yet determined.

Long answer: currently I'm researching my legal options for it.

If it will have a price,  the maximum would be 2$ for the full game (the demo will remain free). If for legal reasons it's not possible, then a donation system will be placed.

If you have any questions, suggestions or anything in your mind please share with me in the comments or on Twitter.

Also, if you could send me your level finishing times I would be grateful. In exchange I mention you in the credits as beta tester if you wish.
